ygData.subject: Twinking - my 2cp
ygData.msgSnippet: My sub-characters have items above their means, but my Cleric lived the hard life just like everyone on their first character. Some of my Twink items were
ygData.messageBody:
My sub-characters have items above their means,
but my Cleric lived the hard life just like everyone
on their first character. Some of my Twink items
were gifts from other players and some were crafted by
my Cleric who had taken up and mastered several
trade skills. Every level I max their skills and most
zones they hunt, my cleric has done time in, so I know
what to expect. I give items out and craft items for
people. To me, it's a personal choice, if you don't want
to twink, that's fine. If you do, fine, what matters
more is how you play. Personally, I'd rather see
someone wearing something they earned even through
another character then to hear the shouts from beggars.
Bottom Line.....it's your $10 you pay every month for
your account - you pay for your cable or ISP, play how
you want.
